description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.5m in depth, maximum height of 3.15m and eaves height of 2.99m)
decision_conditions: The proposed single storey rear extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule  2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The assessment of this application has been based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings. If you carry out development based on incorrect plans you may be liable to the Council taking enforcement action against you.

Please be advised you have submitted a Lawful Development Certificate Application form, and not a Prior Approval Form. kindly resubmit the correct form. If you would like to see the previous form you have submitted to us, in draft form, we can send this to you.
